item.title: Report E-2024120217
item.description:
Report E-2024120217

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-09
  • City: ELKHART LAKE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On December 9, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of sodium hydroxide was punctured and released approximately one-half (0.5) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Valley Environmental Response (VER) to remediate the site. The crew utilized neutralizing agent, absorbents, and hand tools to remove all spent product. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and one (1) cubic yard box for disposal.
